name: Catwalk Queen: Runway Battle
description:
Ready to dress up and battle it out on the catwalk?
Choose the best outfit pieces as you walk based on each style theme. Enjoy a surprising twist at the end of each level!
What's your go-to OOTD for a night out? A wedding? A red carpet event? A blind date?
So many outfits and themes, so little time! Show off your best look for various challenging scenarios by picking and coordinating your outfit down the runway. Time is limited, so making smart outfit choices quickly is crucial in beating your opponent. Avoid making poor style selections—you don't want to see what fate has in store for you at the end! Well, what are you waiting for?
Let the style battle begin!
